metadata.title: USN-5216-1 -- hosted-git-info vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that hosted-git-info incorrectly handled certain inputs. A remote attacker could use this to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5216-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  node-hosted-git-info - 2.8.5-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
